pages.disclaimers: Disclaimers - Legal Information | DiamondElite Hotel Resort DiamondElite HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Important Disclaimers Please review the following important disclaimers before booking your stay at DiamondElite Hotel. **Rates and Availability:** All rates displayed on this website are subject to change and availability. Taxes and gratuities may be added. **Guarantee Policy:** A valid credit card is required to guarantee your reservation. Please refer to our cancellation policy for details on cancellation fees. **Image Disclaimer:** The images displayed on this website are for illustrative purposes only and may not depict the actual furnishings or layout of all rooms. **Accessibility:** We strive to provide reasonable accommodations for guests with disabilities. Please contact us in advance if you have any specific accessibility needs. **Parking:** Parking options and fees may vary. Please refer to our website or contact us for the latest information. **Pet Policy:** We may have restrictions on pets. Please see our pet policy for details or contact us directly. **Limitation of Liability:** DiamondElite Hotel is not liable for any damages arising from your use of this website or your stay at our hotel, except to the extent required by law. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | DiamondElite Hotel Resort DiamondElite HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Your Privacy Policy At DiamondElite Hotel Resort, we understand the importance of safeguarding your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, utilize, and protect your data, ensuring transparency and respecting your privacy. **Gathering Information:** When you interact with our website and services, we may collect certain details that help us personalize your experience. This may include your name, email address, and phone number. **Enhancing Your Stay:** We leverage your information to provide exceptional service, tailor your experience, and keep you informed of reservations, special offers, and property updates. **Data Security:** We prioritize the security of your personal information. We implement industry-leading safeguards to prevent unauthorized access, disclosure, modification, or destruction of your data. **Transparency and Control:** We value your trust. We don't sell, trade, or share your personal information with external parties without your prior consent, except as mandated by law. **Keeping You Informed:** We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We encourage you to revisit this policy regularly for the latest information. **Your Data, Your Rights:** We empower you to manage your data. For more details on our data practices and your rights regarding your personal information, feel free to contact us through our Contact Page. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions | DiamondElite Hotel Resort DiamondElite HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Terms and Conditions to DiamondElite Hotel Resort! By accessing our website or using our exceptional services, you agree to these Terms and Conditions, our Privacy Policy, and any additional guidelines we provide. These policies establish the ground rules for creating a smooth and enjoyable experience for all our guests. Using Our Services We encourage you to explore and utilize our services to plan your dream stay at DiamondElite Hotel Resort. However, to ensure a comfortable and secure environment for everyone, we kindly ask that you use our services responsibly and in accordance with these terms, as well as all applicable laws and regulations. Your Trust is Important We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue our services or your access to them, at any time and for any reason, with or without notice. Our goal is always to act in the best interests of our guests and uphold the quality of service we strive to provide. Limitations of Liability While we take every precaution to ensure a seamless experience, we acknowledge that unforeseen circumstances can arise. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages that may result from your use of our website or services. Working Together If you encounter any issues during your experience with DiamondElite Hotel Resort, we encourage you to reach out to us promptly. We value your feedback and strive to resolve any concerns efficiently. In these Terms and Conditions, you agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from any claims, losses, liabilities, damages, costs, and expenses arising from your violation of these terms or your use of our services.
